lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say Nancy Weiner obtained millions of dollars in stolen artifacts from international smugglers and sold them illegally.

headline.print_headline: Antiquities Dealer Accused of Selling Stolen Artifacts
headline.main: Prominent Antiquities Dealer Accused of Selling Stolen Artifacts

snippet: Prosecutors say Nancy Weiner obtained millions of dollars in stolen artifacts from international smugglers and sold them illegally....
abstract: Iconic New York City antiquities dealer Nancy Wiener is arrested in Manhattan on charges of trafficking in and falsifying ownership documentation for looted antiquities; prosecutors say she and several co-conspirators have been doing such business since at least 1999.
